data.title: Ted Harbert - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Ted Harbert: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

American broadcasting and television executive who was best known as the Chairman of NBC Broadcasting, and the President and CEO of the Comcast Entertainment Group, and Chairman of ABC Entertainment.

Before Fame

He graduated with a degree in Broadcasting and Film from the Boston University School of Communications, where he also worked on the college radio station, WTBU alongside Howard Stern.

Trivia

In 2004, he was appointed to the position of president, E! Networks. He has also served on the boards of Urban Arts Partnership, the Friends of the Saban Free Clinic, City Year LA, Paley Center for Media, Hollywood Radio and Television Society.

Family Life

He is the son of Edward W. Harbert II and Marna Harbert. He has been married to Lisa Medrano since 2011. He has two children, Emily and Will from a previous marriage.

Associated With
